swiftsolutions

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • swiftsolutions.Scheduler

  • public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that will coordinate the various components such that they will work together in a way to produce a valid, optimal schedule based off the input arguments. Various types of scheduling can be set, this is done in the input arguments that are parsed into the start() function.
